item.title: Algorithm: Array Summary Threshold
item.description: Question Given an array of integers $A (a_i \geq 0, i \in [0, n])$ and a threshold $T$. If $\sum_{i = 0}^n a_i > T$, find an integer $t$, for $a_i > t (i \in [0, n]) \to a_i = t$. Find the largest $t$ which makes $\sum_{i = 0}^n a_i \leq T$. For Example, $A = [30, 20, 10, 50, 40],\,\,T = 127$. Expecting $t = 33$. Answer ArraySummaryThreshold.
